__e: Mom, I've spoken with the nurses, and they say that you need...
I think he's the Nightingale killer, and that's why it is so important you tell me what happened to her.
You see, I'm the only one that knows that you killed all those nurses... knows that you killed your own wife too.
The nurses, they're all on Nate's team, but you...
Nurses are always the last to know, first to go.
I'm not gonna die in a hospital where the nurses aren't even hot.
I've gotta get back to the house and check in on this healthcare nurse that's seeing Paul.
Oh, fortunately, I got a little pick-me-up from an orderly that came to get my body.
Anyway, I probably would have gotten cancer... Died in a bed somewhere with a nurse who doesn't know half the shit I know.
I'm one of your mom's nurses. Come in.
I spoke to every one of the nurses on that floor.
It's hard to find a good male nurse these days.
Oh, I can sleep through one of those. So Jill's not in her office, and the nurses told me that her phone's been going straight to voice mail for hours.
The nurses told me you'd be flying in.
"oh, my god a nurse just asked me out."
See, man. Is there any nurses livin' in the neighborhood?

I just don't like people talking to my nurses that way.
